1.title: Zondag 22u37
1.plot: Six people are killed in very luxurious brothel De Limbo. Helena De Ridder, together with Zohra El Zarkaoui and new examining magistrate Pieter-Jan Aelbrecht, try to find whoever is behind it. Every victim, client or prostitute, has his own story. Behind every dead person there seems a possible motive for murder. After a long night of meticulous work, a first important trail comes to light.

2.title: Maandag 11u24
2.plot: The morning after the murders at the brothel, everything is in the papers. Under increasing pressure of the media and public opinion, Helena has to make the right decisions. Bracke has a collision with the new examining magistrate. Now Helena is between two fires. On top of that, Ravenakkers is making Helena's life difficult again and an accidental meeting with an old acquaintance leaves her confused.

1.title: Een havenarbeider van 48
1.plot: There is a bomb alert in the harbor at the big and powerful firm OT&C. They see Rudi Kassel running away and arrest him. It turns out he wanted revenge on the firm, because he got cancer from working with illegal radio-active transports he took part off. He says the firm knew about it and was OK with. Helena wants to investigate OT&C on the illegal transports, but gets a lot of resistance.

2.title: Twee kinderen van 8 en 11
2.plot: The police catch two Roma children breaking in and can arrest the girl. They let her go and follow her. When she goes to her mother, they arrest her and her son too. The children are too young to charge them. Because of language barriers and cultural differences, it's hard to get the parents take responsibilities for their children. Helena is still blamed for the leak on the investigation of OT&C, but they can't prove anything. Manu confesses to her he accidentally mailed the information to a journalist. Helena doesn't want him to tell the Attorney-General, because it...

3.title: Een collega van 29
3.plot: Martijn Kramer, an employee of a brewery, jumped of a silo after a party at work. Although the head and confidential advisor said Martijn was a loner and difficult at work, it soon becomes clear he was bullied. They find terrible pictures of the party, but is it enough to get a conviction? In the mean time Helena finds a letter on her desk informing her of an old case which puts Christine and Thomas in bad daylight. She decides to ask Christine about it.

4.title: Een politieman van 47
4.plot: At night there is a scuffle at a pub and the police are called. Tony and Frank try to break up the fight. Tony gets stabbed with a broken bottle by Julien, a homeless person. Julien who has tuberculosis also coughs a lot in Tony's face and now he also has it. Ravenakkers is Julien's lawyer and gets Julien off easily. The next day Julien is found beaten up badly and accuses inspectors Frank and Tony, but did they really do it? Thomas gives Helena evidence against OT&C, but he doesn't want to reveal the sailor's name who gave him the information. When a letter about ...

5.title: Een homo van 32
5.plot: Mark, a gay man, is badly beaten up in a dark alley and lands in hospital. He says he was attacked from behind and doesn't know who they were. His husband Gerrit, a prominent and very active leader of the gay-movement, wants to take action, but Mark doesn't want to press charges. The wife of Faruk, the Turkish grocer who found Mark, says Faruk was also attacked, because his shirt was torn and full of blood. This contradicts Faruk's earlier statement. Mark says he doesn't know Faruk, but the police find out he called him several times. Faruk keeps changing his story ...

6.title: Een bestuurder van 21
6.plot: Cara Heijne is the deadly victim of a hit and run. When they investigate the scene, the driver Jasper De Schryver suddenly turns up. He knows it was wrong to drive on, but he panicked. He declares, despite him driving a bit too fast, Cara suddenly was in front of his car and he couldn't avoid her. Helena finds out Cara had been to a party and was very drunk. She already fell from her bike once when she decided to go home. Helena thinks Cara and Jasper share the blame, but what will the judge say and how will Cara's parents react? Yves finds it difficult to accept ...

7.title: Een advocate van 57
7.plot: The case OT&C goes to court. Helena wants to know the name of the sailor who was a witness to the illegal radio-active transports, but Thomas doesn't want to say. Because she doesn't have the name, she doesn't make a chance in court. Thomas sees she can't do anything this way and finally gives her the name. Julie Kassel doesn't believe in Helena anymore. Nicole Claus is threatened, because she is the lawyer of OT&C. There is a big conflict between Christine and Yves.

8.title: Een presentatrice van 36
8.plot: Veerle De Pannemaeker is being stalked by journalist Henk Courteyn. He doesn't think it's stalking. When Veerle has good news, she invites him in, but when there is bad news, his paper also wants to print it. Veerle hardly comes out of the house anymore since Henk makes her life a misery. Helena wants to pursue Henk's paper. Now Chrisine is gone, Yves takes over for the time being. Helena discovers the papers chief-editor Smets knows Ravenakkers. Yves doesn't want to pursue any longer, because he thinks Veerle should be used to journalists. Helena can't go against him...

9.title: Een meisje van 16
9.plot: Helena investigates a fire in a dog-kennel. A combustible mixture was poured over a dog and set alight. Then he was send through the entire kennel. An alienist thinks a 16 year old student who works there, did it. He thinks she's a psychopath and treatment won't work. Her father says Charlotte has been like this all her life. She always has known how to manipulate people. Is it possible to treat Charlotte, or should she just go to prison? Thomas is accused of raping a waitress at a party. Helena doesn't believe it, but when she gets a video send where she sees Thomas ...

10.title: Een vrouw van 84
10.plot: When Helena sees the images of Thomas going after waitress Charlotte into the bathroom, she doesn't know if she can trust him anymore. The images were send to her anonymously. She tells Yves everything and he takes the necessary steps. He tells Zohra to check out everything about Thomas and Charlotte to the bottom. There is a complaint against Paul Temmerman for beating up his mother. His sister made the complaint, but their mother says Paul is taking very good care of her and she doesn't want to go anywhere else. When she ends up in hospital because of her diabetes, ...

11.title: Een koerier van 26
11.plot: Helena has an encounter with Charlotte. Charlotte is aggressive and wants to hit Helena. She tries to defend herself and pushes Charlotte away, who falls to the ground. The next day Charlotte files a complaint against Helena and pictures of Helena pushing Charlotte appear in the tabloids. Everyone believes Helena hit Charlotte out of revenge. Helena thinks OT&C are after her and Thomas and that's why they're brought in discredit. Vicky Van Belle hits Michael Snoeckx, a man from a credit institution, with her car. She has a lot of debts and Snoeckx seemed to harass her.

12.title: Een draagmoeder van 21
12.plot: Lynn Michiels carried Lut and Philippe's baby, but Lynn doesn't want to give it them. The more they find out about what exactly happened, the more they find out Lynn lies about a lot of things. Stefanie is the new trainee and Helena has to guide her. Helena asks Cleo to ask around in the neighborhood where she had a fight with Charlotte. Cleo finds a witness who saw a car. When Helena tries to find out who's car it was, Yves finds out what she's doing.

13.title: Een gewezen topadvocaat van 56
13.plot: The evidence against Giovanni has been removed from the dossier, because it was gathered illegally. They need to get new evidence. Zohra can persuade Van Der Zeypen to get Giovanni questioned. They find revealing pictures on his camera. They decide to let him go free, but put a tap on his phone. Some of the pictures tell the truth about Helena's encounter with Charlotte and finally she has her job back. Other pictures prove people are being blackmailed not to say anything. Through the phone-tap, they find out Ravenakkers and Claus are up to their necks in it. Now all ...

1.title: Een bankierster van 29
1.plot: Emma Browne, a successful young banker, is found dead at her apartment. Helena De Ridder is convinced she was murdered and starts preparing for her first big case. The results of the autopsy and the investigation however prove it was an accident. Helena refuses to accept this. The death of Emma Browne just must be more than the umpteenth, trivial drug related accident.

2.title: Een vechtersbaas van 23
2.plot: There is a lot of pressure on Helena when a railway guard is the victim of an unscrupulous and brutal attack. They have to find the perpetrator fast. She does her job carefully, but through some events in her personal life, she makes a cardinal mistake. Gust Martens in the mean time, tries frantically to proof is innocence in the case of Emma Browne.

3.title: Een verkrachtingsslachtoffer van 23
3.plot: After a night out, Tess Verbeken is raped violently and left for dead. Helena discovers parallels with events in her own personal life. She feels less authorized to continue with the case objectively. Gust Martens tries to prove his innocence to write an article from jail in which he accuses banker Karel Decoster.

4.title: Een would-be-muzikant van 25
4.plot: Gust Martens wants to prove to Helena there is a connection between the death of a Croation prostitute and the murder on Emma Browne. According to him they were both victim of a Croation drug gang, who are recently active in Gent. When Tim, Cleo's love, violently gets involved in a drug conflict, Helena fears it might be the same gang.

5.title: Een activist van 59
5.plot: During a demonstration against genetic modified organisms, a field of leeks at the university is ruined. The charismatic professor Kloosters puts himself forward as the eloquent defender of the activists. But the demonstration leads to death and violence. In the drugs-investigation the local police observe a few drug-premises. Helena and Inspector Stevens get along very fine.

6.title: Een vondeling van enkele dagen
6.plot: At the Christmas-market in Gent, Inspector Tony Laeremans finds a few days old baby. The parents Valérie Pieters and Daan Vergauwe, a drugs-couple, are found quickly. When she wants her baby back, Helena tries to prevent this. But is this justified? Or is her judgment clouded by her own mother who suddenly turns up again. Helena makes an impulse decision in her love-life.

7.title: Een gedetineerde van 55
7.plot: A prisoner is found dead in his isolation cell. It's Paul Vandenbon. An old acquaintance of Helena. She discovers that the former footballer is treated harshly as a pedophile in jail. Not only the prisoners, but also the guards act strange when they're questioned. Meanwhile everyone is getting ready to prepare for the final blow against the Croations drug gang.

8.title: Een cafébaas van 35
8.plot: Landlord Frank Huysman is violently forced to sell his pub. It looks like Adam Horvat has something to do with the dossier again. The drug-gang has been tipped off. Bracke searches for the responsible one within the police and even his own office. Helena fears the leak might be very close. In the mean time everyone is searching for Gust Martens.

9.title: Een tangoleraar van 32
9.plot: A tango-teacher is the victim of arson. He immediately knows who did this to him. An ex-student of him, who accused him of rape in the past, started a hate-campaign against him through social media. So she has to be it. Together with her friend, she sets a chain of events in motion she can't control any longer. Banker Decoster is finally questioned about the disappearance of Gust Martens.

10.title: Een Scientology-lid van 37
10.plot: A divorced woman accuses her ex-husband of touching up their little daughter. Is this the alarming truth? Or is it just a new low in a very bad divorce of a couple who can't deal with their heart rendering trauma from the past? Louis starts a very risky poker game with Aleksandra Arbanas. And Cleo has exciting news.

11.title: Een chemiestudente van 19
11.plot: A female student seemingly attacks people at a supermarket without any reason. One of the victims is Zohra. Her life hangs by a thread. The defense of the woman claims she can't be held responsible for her actions. Helena refuses to accept this at face value. Louis fears it's the end of the road for him.

12.title: Een (ex-)flik van 29
12.plot: Louis Stevens finally gets some result with his undercover work. He finds the evidence Helena needs to finally stop the Arbanas-gang and put them behind bars for good. Because the gang starts to distrust Louis, Helena thinks it's time to stop the undercover operation. But then someone makes an inexcusable error with far stretching consequences

13.title: Een parketmagistrate van 30
13.plot: Helena's first murder case starts bad. Three murders. The goal is high, but the evidence is thin. Besides that, her major opponent is the very experienced lawyer Jan Ravenakkers. With Bracke as her counselor and Manu as her loyal supporter, Helena tries to get the Arbanasgang convicted. Will she convince the jury of twelve?

imdb.title: De Ridder
plot: Helena is a public prosecutor in Gent.::DvK
